data.title: Miss USA 2024 Date, Contestants, Host & Judges, Where to watch?

Miss USA 2024 The 73rd Miss USA pageant is ... Read more
data.text:
Miss USA 2024 is just around the corner, 4 August 2024, increasing the curiosity among the fans. The Miss Universe organization announced the US state and federal district representatives in the 2024 pageant. The article covers everything you wish to learn about the Miss USA 2024.

Miss USA 2024

The 73rd Miss USA pageant is going to be held on 4 August 2024 at the Peacock Theater, in Los Angeles, California. The national beauty pageant has been back in its homeland California. After last year’s events, where both Miss USA and Miss Teen USA resigned from the pageant is back in its glory again.

This year, the Miss Universe Organization has allowed contestants of 28 years or over to participate in the Miss USA crown. The Miss USA organization concluded the state pageant on 7 July 2024 to select the respective federal district and State delegates for the 2024 national pageant.

According to the officials, this year, 51 contestants are participating in the Miss USA crown. The contestants will go through several rounds, such as evening gowns, swimsuits, Miss Teen USA, onstage interviews with judges, etc. Before the Miss USA 2024, the Miss Teen USA 2024 was crowned on 1 August 2024, where Miss Mississippi Teen USA Addie Carver won the title for the year.

The current Miss USA Savannah Gankiewics who took the role of Miss USA after Noelia Voigt resigned from the title will crown the next Miss USA 2024 at the event who will represent the country at Miss Universe.

Miss USA 2024 Contestants

As we have mentioned earlier, the 2024 Miss USA pageant will have 51 contestants from across the country. Let’s introduce you to all the delegates of the Miss USA 2024 who won their State pageant:

Name State/District Diane Westhoven Alabama Brenna Schaake Alaska K Johnson Arizona Madeline Bohlman Arkansas Samantha Ramos California Jessi Kalambayi Colorado Shavana Clarke Connecticut Alyssa Bainbridge Delaware Kleo Torres District of Columbia Peyton Lewis Florida Emmaline Farmer Georgia Breea Yamat Hawaii Kaitlyn” Kit” Widmyer Idaho Grace Rodi Illinois Stephanie’s Sullivan Indiana Mckenzie Ariana Kerry Iowa Bella Whitlock Kansas Conor Perry Kentucky Sydney Taylor Louisiana Anne Summer Baldridge Maine Bailey Anne Maryland Melissa Sapini Massachusetts Alma Cooper Michigan Muna Ali Minnesota Kaylee Brooke McCollum Mississippi Ashleigh Bedwell Missouri Shelby Dangerfield Montana Kami Buchanan Nebraska Najah Ali Nevada Ariel Sullivan New Hampshire Jabili Kandula New Jersey Mackenzie Sydow New Mexico Kenzie Hansley New Carolina Marizza Delgado New York Codi Miller North Dakota Danika Christopherson Oklahoma Macy Hudson Ohio Shyla Montgomery Oregon Noni Diarra Pennsylvania Kaitlynne Santana Rhode Island Gracen Grainger South Carolina Ahmitata Alwal South Dakota Christell Foote Tennessee Aarieanna Ware Texas Alyssa Chandler Utah Samantha Vocatura Vermont Himanvi Panidepu Virginia Tiffany Rea Washington Caylie Simmons West Virginia Tori Trittin Wisconsin Mackenzie Rush Wyoming

Miss USA 2024 Host & Judges

The Miss USA 2024 will be presented by Keltie Knight, Patrick Starr, Garcelle Beauvais, and Morgon Romano at the LA Peacock Theater. The host of the 2024 national pageant will be Gracelle Beauvis and Keltie and Morgan Romano (Miss Universe 2022) & YouTuber Patrick Starr will be the commentator throughout the event.

The Miss USA 2024 judges panel has many prominent names, such as:

Anastasia Beverly Hills (CEO of Anastasia Soare),

Motivational speaker Natasha Grazino,

Miss USA 1994 Lu Parker,

Miss USA 1990 Carole Gist,

Singer Gavin Degraw

APL Managing Partner NJ Falk

The judging panel of the Miss USA 2024 has some accomplished women who will offer their unique perspectives and charm to the pageant. The 2024 national pageant is produced by Renato Basile of RB Entertainment and Tora Livia is the director of the event with Augie Max Vargas.

Where to watch Miss USA 2024?

The fans can watch the Miss USA 2024 pageant live streaming on the CW Network on Sunday, 4 August 2024 between 8:00 PM – 10:00 PM ET. On 25 April 2024, the CW network signed a multi-year agreement broadcasting the Miss USA pageants with the Miss USA organization.

The CW network has live steamed the Miss Teen USA event on 1 August 2024 from the Peacock Theater.

The 2024 Miss USA beauty pageant is returning to where it all begins to celebrate the hard work, passion, ambition, and dreams of women from all over the USA. The countdown has begun, and fans can buy tickets for the venue from the official Miss USA website.
